about_the_game:
Plati and the Tower of Time is a challenging precision platformer with a focus on mobility and speed. Use your grappling hook to swing around multiples levels to find out what is at the end of the tower as fast as you can.

Play as a... platypus? Plati the platypus?!

Meet Plati, she's a platypus, an explorer and a fearless adventurer, with her grappling hook she can go through almost anything. Sometimes the path ahead doesn't allow Plati to fully use the grappling hook, when that happens she can use her strong arms to climb any wall or obstacle.

Features

  • A single player adventure with a great focus on mobility and speed
  • Swing around levels avoiding spikes and holes
  • Go through 5 worlds and collect time relics
  • Compete to get the best time on each level
